main event: An unidentified flying object was observed near Miho Air Base, Japan on July 14, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as 4-5 times the size of the full moon and appeared white with a short tail., Its speed was estimated at 600 mph, and it seemed to be burning as it disappeared., The sighting lasted for 5-6 seconds., The reported direction of motion was southeast., Analysis ruled out confusion with known aircraft, natural phenomena, and a meteor.
